attributes.action: Stop currys (electrical retailer) from giving misleading and shockingly poor service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tonight I bought a camcorder from currys in Bluewater. The box was opened and the sales person named Jay said it was opened only for the purpose of checking that all the items were present. When I got home and tried to use it I found that the charger was missing and that the screen was dirty with fingerprints.They could not be reached on the phone which was costing me 7p per minute whilst trying

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
